mapper.select: select id, FULL_NAME as fullname, PARENT_ID as parentId from sys_dept limit #{currPage, jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{pageSize, jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, FULL_NAME as fullname, PARENT_ID as parentId from sys_dept where id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into dept(id, fullName, parentId) value (#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fullName, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete from sys_dept where id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
